alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 26 at 4:33AM CDT until October 28 at 2:10AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... West Fork Trinity River At Grand Prairie affecting Tarrant and Dallas Counties. Trinity River At Dallas affecting Dallas County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River at Dallas. * WHEN...From early this morning to early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 38.0 feet, Moderate flooding will begin along the river both above and below the Commerce Street bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 33.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 30.0 feet. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall below flood stage to 27.4 feet early this morning. It will then rise above flood stage later this morning to 37.7 feet late this afternoon. It will fall below flood stage again early tomorrow afternoon. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
